name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 26, a document from the Nanyang Women's Federation showed that the All-China Women's Federation plans to hold a "mass wedding of 10,000 people" across the country on the occasion of the 75th anniversary of the National Day to guide families and young people to establish correct views on marriage, love, childbearing, and family. The newlyweds participating in the wedding must wear Chinese wedding clothes and promise not to accept gifts or hold large banquets.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the afternoon of July 28, on the streets of Chongqing

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 28, Dandong, Liaoning Province, water situation

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 28, a dam in Xiangtan, Hunan, collapsed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/SiQwYwG3jl

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of July 28, at the Huanglong Stadium in Hangzhou, Zhejiang, in the 20th round of the Chinese Super League, Chengdu Rongcheng defeated Zhejiang FC 3:1. After the game, fans of both sides had a fierce dispute outside the stadium.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 27, in the women's epee final of the Paris Olympics, Chinese player Sun Yiwen lost to Japanese player Yoshimura Miho and failed to advance to the top 16. In an interview after the game, Sun Yiwen said that her opponent's last sword did not stab her.
In response, netizens replied, "Did the Japanese give money to the referee?" "This referee must have received a lot of Japanese yen"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 28, Jining, Shandong. A man from Fenglou Village reported under his real name that the public toilet built in the village had not been used for four or five years, and that farmland was full of garbage and no one cleaned it, while the deputy mayor and village secretary had been receiving cleaning wages. Afterwards, the man's family was summoned by the local police station for forwarding the report video.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a female employee of Dongsheng Futures confessed with her ID card. She claimed that she was pursued by many men and was blinded by profit, and did not keep her bottom line, and her private life was chaotic. The female employee said that she was involved with many men and had relationships with many people, and lied that she only had one lover.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 28, some netizens took photos of North Korean residents on the other side of the Yalu River standing on the rooftops waiting for rescue, and North Korean helicopters and ships appeared in the Yalu River. A Dandong resident said, "There used to be corn fields and houses on the North Korean side, but now they are all flooded."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 27, more than 5,000 residents of Sinuiju City and several islands in Uiju County, North Korea were trapped, and the North Korean media called it a "serious crisis"; on July 28, Kim Jong-un rushed to the disaster area and personally supervised the rescue work of severe flood disasters in remote areas of North Korea, and condemned the inaction of the team cadres.
In response, Chinese netizens mocked, "The general is the sun, and the water will dry up after shining on it."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 11, an account on Xiaohongshu claiming to be a female employee of Dongsheng Futures exposed herself with her ID card. She said she was a gold digger with a chaotic private life and had had relationships with many men in the industry behind her boyfriend's back.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 25, Changli County, Hebei Province. A netizen from Liangshan, Sichuan Province posted a video saying that in the hot weather of over 30 degrees, more than 100 potato pickers were crowded in a dilapidated greenhouse, doing the hardest and most tiring work every day, but eating the same old cabbage stewed with potatoes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 28, at the Pinduoduo headquarters in Guangzhou, a large number of TEMU merchants who were fined went to blockade and protest again.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 26, Shanxi. Blogger Zhao Shiling dubbed the movie "Downfall" in dialect, complaining that the Paris Olympics was stingy and did not install air conditioners, and that the athletes' beds were made of cardboard. The Olympics should be held in Taiyuan, Shanxi.

name: 李老师不是你老师
李老师不是你老师
content: According to a report on July 29, Hong Kong property prices have fallen for two consecutive months, falling below the multi-year low set before the withdrawal of the stimulus package, while rents have risen for four consecutive months. The private residential sales price index fell to 301.8 in June, a nearly eight-year low.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 29, Xi Jinping met with Italian Prime Minister Meroni in Beijing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/188TOcPKF4

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 29, the A-share market opened with the "enhanced version of the Shanghai Composite Index" and the Shanghai Composite Total Return Index real-time market, with 3320.89 as the base point. 
It opened down 0.05% at 3198.29 points. However, netizens are not optimistic about this, and believe that the battle to defend 2800 points will still be launched.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The B station up master "Totem Tactical Solution" released a video, opening the box of an active lieutenant officer of the People's Liberation Army.
The cause of the incident was that the up master believed that the officer had maliciously slandered and spread rumors on the Internet. As of now, the "Totem Tactical Solution" account has been banned.
It is reported that Totem Tactical Solution is a defense company that provides military and police teaching and equipment solutions.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 29, Zhuzhou, Hunan. Netizens questioned the staff's pointless cleaning of garbage in the stagnant water with bare hands, and were insulted by a retired veteran.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, in Suzhou, Jiangsu, a woman posted that her husband worked at Dreame Technology Co., Ltd. and died suddenly on April 17 due to long-term overtime and high-intensity work. On July 25, the company said it would only compensate 50,000 yuan. The incident was forwarded by many netizens.
Public information shows that Dreame Technology (abbreviated as Dreame) was founded in

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Ding Guoqing, a policeman in Shaoxing, Zhejiang, publicly appealed to the society for help
Telling about his experience of being illegally demolished, which eventually led to the destruction of his family and the separation of his wife and children.
In 2019, he was promoted by the local police as a work model.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Guan Kai, former deputy commander of the Lanzhou Military Region, died in Beijing on July 21, 2024 at the age of 76. An informed netizen revealed that Guan Kai was unconscious in a car accident while riding a bicycle for exercise on the day of the accident. Because he did not carry a mobile phone and ID, his identity could not be confirmed. He was eventually sent to the Civil Aviation Hospital as an ordinary person, but died in vain.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 28 (Release) A reporter claiming to be a party newspaper editor published an article saying that Pei Yongbo, the mayor of Macheng City, Hubei Province, colluded with the developer and transferred his own land to the developer for the construction of a villa project. The developer also forced the construction without compensation. The mother went to stop it and was violently treated. She called 110 to report the incident, but the police said "they can't control the developer"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 29, CCTV reported that a large number of oysters appeared on the beaches of Fuzhou, Shenzhen and other places after the typhoon, reminding everyone not to eat them as much as possible.
Netizens laughed and said: We have been eating kerosene for so many years, and we are still afraid of oysters?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to a report on July 29, Chinese Ambassador to the United States Xie Feng: Hostility will inevitably lead to a lose-lose situation. Partners are the correct positioning of China and the United States towards each other.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Xinshuikeng Village in Panyu, Guangzhou, announced that it would provide childbirth subsidies, with a reward of 20,000 yuan for the second child and 30,000 yuan for the third child. This was boycotted and ridiculed by netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 17, according to the China Food Quality Network, on July 16, the Netherlands reported that the white rice cakes exported by a Chinese company were substandard because the product contained unauthorized genetically modified ingredients. 
To this, netizens responded, "It's the best that it can be exported!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 28, the "Clean Fuzhou" WeChat public account reported that Tong Shengguang, the former director of the Zixi County Transportation Quality Supervision Station in Jiangxi Province, was suspected of serious violations of discipline and law. Because he voluntarily surrendered with money, he was given lenient treatment and returned to his job.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 26, Chongqing. Netizens exposed a food factory in Chongqing where workers touched chocolate without wearing gloves, and the comment section became a large-scale 315 exposure scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 29 (Released) Zigong, Sichuan. At Fanhua 1939 Commercial Center, several men had a dispute, and one of them pointed a gun at another man.
Zigong Public Security Bureau: We know about this incident, but it is not convenient to respond.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 26, Bayannur City, Inner Mongolia. Parents bought houses in Linhe District, but still could not send their children to school nearby, so they put up banners outside the Education Bureau to protest their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The greatest tragedy of social transformation that history will remember is not the clamor of the bad guys, but the silence of the good guys.
